11.content: Which family is moving to this city
11.title: Group 1

111.content:
Choose a Lesbian family to follow.

(Family 1)

You are 16 Jenny Smith you upset that your mom got married and is forcing you to move to a new city. Your body type is 5ft 6in with C-cup breasts and average looks and brown hair. You dislike your step mom because you feel like she is perving on you. Your mom doesn't believe you and thinks your just jealous you aren't the center of her attention since your father left.


Jackie Smith - is 32 she had her daughter at a young age. Body type is 5ft 2in she is a B -cup with less then average looks and red hair. Her husband left after Jenny's 4th birthday. Since then Jackie has put her daughter above everything else until she meet her new Wife Sarah Smith. Jackie and Sarah have been together for two gears before getting married. Jackie has never felt more complete since meeting her wife. Jackie is also weak wiled and submissive.


Sarah Smith - is 38 and a pervert. She is 7ft F -cup breast highly attractive with blonde hair. Sarah is sensitive about being so tall and being called a Amazon. Sarah had bad luck with her girlfriends until she meet Jackie she was the perfect submissive partner for her. Since being bullied when she was younger for her height has made her become a domineering personality to never let a bully hurt her again. But in return it has made her a bitch. Sarah has a secret fetish she wants to live out having a 3 way with a mother and daughter. Sarah is happy that Jackie is so trusting but Jenny acts to distant. In fact Jackie being so submissive with a hot daughter was the reason Sarah even went after Jackie.

(Choose the Smith family to find out what happens to them.)


(Family 2)


You are 18 year old Rachel Reed is a D -cup 6ft. You and your family are moving to a new City for your mothers job. You have a little sister who can be a brat but you look after her. Your hobbies are gaming and anime. You don't have much confidence in your self even if you are attractive. The only thing you don't like about the move was having to break up with your girlfriend. Who knows maybe you will meet some one new.


Marry Reeds 8 years old. She enjoys pulling pranks on people and ruining romantic moments for her moms and sister. Because of her pranks she didn't have any real friends back home. Hopefully she doesn't prank the wrong person in her new city.



Juliet Reed age 40 D -cup breasts 6ft 2in and gave birth to Rachel and Marry. Juliet is a happy to be a housewife. Juliet is getting tried of her youngest always ruining her romantic moments with her wife. Juliet was happy that Rachel had to break up with her old girlfriend and plans to play matchmaker to help her daughter meet someone new.


Carry Reed 42 C -cup 5ft 10in has been married to her wife since they got out of highschool. Carry works at a add firm and was told its very cutthroat and where they will chew you up and shit you out.


(Will you choose the Reed family and see their fate)


(family 3)


Your name is Sam and you are 14 years old and 5ft 5in. Sam can be male or female you can decide in this story. You got adopted by your new moms. They are nice if a bit weird you can't figure them out.


Daphnie Chan is 36 with C -cup breats and is 5ft 9in with ginger hair. You white and married to your wife Jade Chan. You both have lived in the city for years. Both Daphnie a d Jade will protect Sam and try and teach them how to survive in this world. Daphnie works with Jade at their family restaurant.


Jade Chan is 28 5ft 4in black hair half Chinese and Japanese. Has double C -cup breasts. Has been married to her wife for 10 years but has been dating her for 12. Jades parent's where against them dating until Daphnie had a special talk with them. Daphnie was Jades tutor back when Jade was in high school. They have been running the restaurant but its unknown how they got it.

(Choose the Chan family to follow their adventures)

info.brief_description: People get lost in a city only to wind up eaten.
info.description:
Choose from five groups of people as they try and get out of the city. Anything goes in this city the only limits are your own imagination. Don't try and end the story to fast. Also if you kill off all the characters in the group you can switch the main character to who ever ended them. Also have fun.

Group 1- a family moving to the city but they got lost.

Group 2- a couple of kids and their parents get lost while trying to get to there destination.

Group 3 - a party wanders to the wrong side of town.

Group 4 - Kids out from School get in to trouble.

Group 5 - a couple trys to get out of the city alive and with their loved one.


Each group has characters you a can choose from to move the story forward. I hope you have fun with it.
